root: ^You have seven days to discover what happened to your father
^Each day will start in the morning where the player can review events from previous dates in her journal and will receive letters from the girls’ familiars
^The place will get two choices of where to go, one at noon and one in the evening
^At night the player can write one of the girls a letter and your familiar will deliver it
^The new Van Helsing will be appointed at the end of the seven day midnight during a full moon.
^During the night of the final day, instead of writing letter, the player must choose the evidence to present in the trial.
^A perfect run will be triggered if the player chooses the three correct pieces of evidence, each unlocked when they romance each of the girls.
